snippet.title: LAST REBELLION OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
Assume the roles of Nine and Aisha who share a single body in the cursed world of Junovald, a land where two gods govern life and death. Decimate your enemies using an intuitive, turn-based battle system which allows you to target individual body parts, as you protect the world from demons and seek revenge for your father's death.

Product Info: http://koei.co.uk/viewgame/?gid=90
Platform(s): PlayStation 3

Best Regards,
TECMO KOEI EUROPE LTD. - http://tecmokoei-europe.com
